title: Why do you think exercise is important? What benefits have you experienced?

korean: 운동하고 나서 삶의 질이 확실히 좋아진 것 같아.
예전엔 조금만 움직여도 숨이 차고 쉽게 피곤했어.
지금은 체력이 좋아져서 일상생활이 훨씬 수월해.
계단 올라갈 때도 숨 안 차고, 무거운 거 들기도 편해졌어.
스트레스 받을 때 운동하면 기분이 확 풀려.
땀 흘리고 나면 머리도 맑아지고 잡생각이 사라져.
밤에 잠도 더 잘 오고, 수면의 질도 좋아진 것 같아.
옷 입을 때도 핏이 달라져서 쇼핑하는 재미도 생겼어.
건강검진 받았을 때 수치도 다 정상이라고 나왔어.
나이 들어서도 건강하려면 지금부터 관리해야 할 것 같아.
english: After exercising, I think my quality of life has, like, definitely improved.
In the past, even if I moved a little, I was out of breath and easily tired.
Now my stamina has improved, so daily life is much easier.
Even when climbing stairs, I don't get out of breath, and lifting heavy things has become comfortable.
When I'm stressed, if I exercise, well, my mood is completely relieved.
After sweating, my head clears and distracting thoughts disappear.
I sleep better at night, and I think the quality of sleep has improved.
As my body got better, you know, I gained confidence.
The fit is different when wearing clothes, so the fun of shopping has also emerged.
When I got a health checkup, all the numbers came out normal.
I think I need to take care of myself from now to be healthy even as I age.
I go around recommending exercise to people around me.
